name: MindSpace (SBL_Andres)
description:
It started off as an idea to play around with a more abstract notion of "Space". But things went off the rails pretty quickly (as it one would expect in a game jam), and thus MindSpace was born. One part platformer, one part exploration, three parts rushing to get something done before the deadline.

Controls: 

  • 'E' to interact.
  • Space to jump.
  • Mouse to look around.
  • WASD to move.
  • Alt-F4 to quit (No fancy menus here!)
